original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1301)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(941)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在  <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4729)@</color> 秒內強化自身 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4729)@</color> 點武力，且死亡時會在原地掉落造成瘟疫的棺材。
text: <color=#FFE787>Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1301)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(941)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in front of you, and strengthens itself in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4729)@</color> seconds<color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str( 4729)@</color> Use force, and the coffin that caused the plague will fall on the spot when you die.
